sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './WordToGuess.css' const HIDDEN_SYMBOL = '_' const Letter = ({ lettre, feedback, index, onClick }) => (
onClick(index)}> {feedback === 'hidden' ? HIDDEN_SYMBOL : lettre}
) Letter.propTypes = { lettre: PropTypes.string.isRequired, feedback: PropTypes.oneOf([ 'hidden', 'visible', ]).isRequired, index: PropTypes.number.isRequired, onClick: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default Letter
